UPDATE post
  SET 
		title = {{title_field.text}},
		slug = {{slug_field.text}},
		content = {{content_field.text}},
		status = {{status_field.selectedOptionValue}},
		created_at = {{created_field.text}},
		updated_at = {{updated_field.text}}
  WHERE id = {{appsmith.store.id}};
